subject: Steve's Box #1
author: urkel23@aol.com

--part1_43caf.7c9af751.38dc2a59_alt_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 
Well, i finally figured out what i did wrong on the circuit.  I made a  
solder bridge from the pot to one of the resistors.  It sounds nice now,  it's 
an AM only box for now.  I had it sweeping both, but FM sucks on this  
radio.  I did a 1 minute test audio, so you guys can hear how it  sounds.  All i 
have to do is cut the shaft on the pot and put the knob back  on and it's 
done, that should take a couple minutes tomorrow at work.  Here  are a couple 
files from the sample test i did.
 
-Steve H.
 
 
 
 
Steve Hultay
_www.keyportparanormal.com_ (http://www.keyportparanormal.com/)
